properties.description: Construction of a modern three-bedroom house with a private swimming pool in Mount Lavinia, designed to combine contemporary living with comfort and functionality. The project features spacious interiors, high-quality finishes, and thoughtful planning to suit a coastal residential lifestyle
properties.longDescription: A super-luxury two-storey residence spanning 2,000 sq.ft. on 7 perches of land, featuring three spacious bedrooms, two elegant bathrooms, and a private swimming pool with an outdoor entertainment area. Built with a reinforced concrete structure (25-year warranty) and premium bathroom fittings (5-year warranty), this unfurnished, one-year-old home offers parking for two vehicles and will be available soon.

properties.description: A modern, fully furnished apartment at Cinnamon Life offering stylish interiors, quality finishes, and beautiful city or ocean views. Enjoy premium amenities, 24/7 security, and a prime Colombo location—ideal for luxury living or investment.
properties.longDescription: Experience upscale city living in this beautifully furnished Type C residential apartment located in the prestigious Cinnamon Life, Colombo 02. Situated on a higher floor, this 1,240 sq. ft. apartment offers breathtaking Lotus Tower and Port City views.

properties.description: Modern 3-bedroom house featuring a private pool, spacious living areas, and contemporary design for comfortable family living.
properties.longDescription: Elegant 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom luxury home featuring a private pool and outdoor entertainment area. Built with a reinforced concrete structure (25-year warranty) and premium bathroom fittings (5-year warranty). Construction completed in just 6 months + rain delays.

properties.description: Modern furnished apartment in Luna Tower, featuring stylish interiors, prime location, and ready-to-move-in comfort.
properties.longDescription: Located in Union Place, Colombo 02, this A-Type apartment offers 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a maid’s bathroom, and 1,010 sq.ft of fully furnished space on a higher floor. Enjoy city views, plus access to gym and pool facilities.

properties.description: Elegant 4-bedroom luxury home in Dehiwala, combining modern design, spacious living areas, and premium finishes for comfortable, stylish living.
properties.longDescription: Ultra-modern luxury house built on your land featuring 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, living room, maid’s room, private pool, rooftop entertainment area, and 4-car parking with remote gate. Designed by UK-qualified architects, constructed with 3 decades of expertise in 8 months using top-quality Lanka tiles, Rocell bathroom fittings, and a marble-top kitchen with PVC pantry. Construction included—watch the house video for more details.

properties.description: Elegant 3-bedroom luxury apartments for sale in Nugegoda, featuring modern design, spacious living areas, and prime location convenience.
properties.longDescription: Luxury 3-bedroom apartments in Nugegoda start at LKR 53M + Tax. Reserve with LKR 1M, pay 25% upfront, 65% in installments during construction, and 10% on deed transfer.

properties.description: Modern 2-bedroom house construction project in Weligama, designed for comfort and functionality with quality finishes.
properties.longDescription: Spacious 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom home with 1000 sq ft of living space. Enjoy your own private pool and outdoor entertainment area in beautiful Weligama. New construction on your land for Rs. 14.6M (146 Laks). Legal support for foreigners and construction completed in just 4 months.
